sentences.sCn: 这种阳离子能透入孢子。

sentences.sContent: Salicylic acid (SA) has no inhibition in growth of hyphae, and no obvious influence on spore germination.
sentences.sContent_eng: Salicylic acid (SA) has no inhibition in growth of hyphae, and no obvious influence on spore germination.
sentences.sCn: 水杨酸对焦枯病菌菌丝的生长无抑制作用，对孢子萌发的影响不显著。

sentences.sContent: Don't flee battles just because they seem pointless to you. A horde of spore plants when you can shoot two targeted shots per round is still good xp!
sentences.sContent_eng: Don't flee battles just because they seem pointless to you. A horde of spore plants when you can shoot two targeted shots per round is still good xp!
sentences.sCn: 不用逃避战斗，因为他们似乎对你无所谓。一大批孢子植物时，你可以各个击破它们并得到一些经验值！

words.tran: 侧孢病霉；[医] 孢子丝菌病；分支孢菌病

trans.tranOther: a cell like a seed that is produced by some plants such as  mushrooms  and can develop into a new plant
